name: Lo-Bit Loops
description:
loop - [luːp] - noun - in music a loop is a sample of a performance that has been edited to repeat seamlessly when the audio file is played end to end.

controls

  • hover to preview a loop
  • click to select / deselect the loop
  • press the button to play / stop the loops
  • click the arrows to navigate between different loop volumes

This is a game made for the Black and White Jam #8.
